mapper.select: /*getCardLossList*/ SELECT A.*, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_CARD_LOSS A WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}
mapper.insert:
/*insertCardLoss*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_CARD_LOSS ( EMP_NM, EMP_SEQ, DEPT_SEQ, DEPT_NAME, CARD_NO, CARD_MST, CL_DE, CL_LOC, CL_ISS ) VALUES ( #{empName}, #{empSeq}, #{deptSeq}, #{deptName}, #{cardNo}, #{cardMst}, #{clDe}, #{clLoc}, #{clIss} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_INSIDE' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_TP_CARD_LOSS'
mapper.update: /*updateCardLoss*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_CARD_LOSS SET EMP_NM = #{empName}, EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, DEPT_SEQ = #{deptSeq}, DEPT_NAME = #{deptName}, CARD_NO = #{cardNo}, CARD_MST = #{cardMst}, CL_DE = #{clDe}, CL_LOC = #{clLoc}, CL_ISS = #{clIss} WHERE TP_CL_SN = #{tpClSn}
mapper.select: /*getCardLossData*/ SELECT TCL.*, DI.APPRO_KEY, DI.DOC_MENU_CD FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_CARD_LOSS TCL LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DI ON TCL.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID WHERE TCL.TP_CL_SN = #{tpClSn}
/*getAccCertList*/ SELECT A.*, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_ACC_CERT A WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}
mapper.insert:
/*insertAccCert*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_ACC_CERT ( EMP_NAME, EMP_SEQ, DEPT_SEQ, DEPT_NAME, ACC_CERT_TYPE, ACC_CERT_USE, STR_DE, END_DE ) VALUES ( #{empName}, #{empSeq}, #{deptSeq}, #{deptName}, #{accCertType}, #{accCertUse}, #{strDe}, #{endDe} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_INSIDE' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_TP_ACC_CERT'
mapper.update: /*updateAccCert*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_ACC_CERT SET EMP_NAME = #{empName}, EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, DEPT_SEQ = #{deptSeq}, DEPT_NAME = #{deptName}, ACC_CERT_TYPE = #{accCertType}, ACC_CERT_USE = #{accCertUse}, STR_DE = #{strDe}, END_DE = #{endDe} WHERE ACC_CERT_SN = #{accCertSn}
mapper.select: /*getAccCertData*/ SELECT TAC.*, DI.APPRO_KEY, DI.DOC_MENU_CD FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_ACC_CERT TAC LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DI ON TAC.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID WHERE ACC_CERT_SN = #{accCertSn}
mapper.insert:
/*insertCorpBank*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_CORP_BANK ( EMP_NAME, EMP_SEQ, DEPT_SEQ, DEPT_NAME, PJT_SN, BANK, ISS_DE, USE_RMK, CORP_EXP, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{empName}, #{empSeq}, #{deptSeq}, #{deptName}, #{pjtSn}, #{bank}, #{issDe}, #{useRmk}, #{corpExp}, #{empSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_INSIDE' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_TP_CORP_BANK'
mapper.update: /*updateCorpBank*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_CORP_BANK SET EMP_NAME = #{empName}, EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, DEPT_SEQ = #{deptSeq}, DEPT_NAME = #{deptName}, PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}, BANK = #{bank}, ISS_DE = #{issDe}, USE_RMK = #{useRmk}, CORP_EXP = #{corpExp}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MOD_DT = now() WHERE CORP_BANK_SN = #{corpBankSn}
mapper.select: /*getCorpBankData*/ SELECT A.*, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DATE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_CORP_BANK A WHERE CORP_BANK_SN = #{corpBankSn}

/*getCorpBankList*/ SELECT A.*, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DE, (SELECT BS_TITLE FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT WHERE PJT_SN = A.PJT_SN) AS BS_TITLE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_CORP_BANK A WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}
mapper.insert:
/*insertCorpCard*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_CORP_CARD ( EMP_NAME, EMP_SEQ, DEPT_SEQ, DEPT_NAME, TYPE, APP_DE, APP_CNT, APP_ISS, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{empName}, #{empSeq}, #{deptSeq}, #{deptName}, #{type}, #{appDe}, #{appCnt}, #{appIss}, #{regEmpSeq} )

mapper.update: /*updateCorpCard*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_CORP_CARD SET EMP_NAME = #{empName}, EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, DEPT_SEQ = #{deptSeq}, DEPT_NAME = #{deptName}, TYPE = #{type}, APP_DE = #{appDe}, APP_CNT = #{appCnt}, APP_ISS = #{appIss}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq}, MOD_DT = now() WHERE CORP_CARD_SN = #{corpCardSn}
mapper.insert:
/*insertSignetTo*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_SIGNET_TO ( USE_ISS, STR_DE, END_DE, SIGN_TYPE, SUB_TYPE, EMP_SEQ, EMP_NAME, DEPT_SEQ, DEPT_NAME, POSITION, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{useIss}, #{strDe}, #{endDe}, #{signType}, #{subType}, #{empSeq}, #{empName}, #{deptSeq}, #{deptName}, #{position}, #{empSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_INSIDE' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_TP_SIGNET_TO'
mapper.update: /*updateSignetTo*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_SIGNET_TO SET USE_ISS = #{useIss}, SIGN_TYPE = #{signType}, SUB_TYPE = #{subType}, STR_DE = #{strDe}, END_DE = #{endDe}, EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, EMP_NAME = #{empName}, DEPT_SEQ = #{deptSeq}, DEPT_NAME = #{deptName}, POSITION = #{position}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MOD_DT = now() WHERE SIGN_SN = #{signSn}
mapper.select: /*getSignetToData*/ SELECT A.*, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DE, DI.APPRO_KEY, DI.DOC_MENU_CD FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_SIGNET_TO A LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DI ON A.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID WHERE SIGN_SN = #{signSn}
/*getSignetToList*/ SELECT A.*, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_SIGNET_TO A WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}
mapper.insert:
/*insertDisAsset*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_DIS_ASSET ( EMP_NAME, EMP_SEQ, DEPT_SEQ, DEPT_NAME, ASSET_NO, MODEL, INS_AMT, PURC_LOC, ASSET_NM, DIS_ISS, DIS_ASSET_PB, INS_DE, DIS_ASSET_DE, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{empName}, #{empSeq}, #{deptSeq}, #{deptName}, #{assetNo}, #{model}, #{insAmt}, #{purcLoc}, #{assetNm}, #{disIss}, #{disAssetPb}, #{insDe}, #{disAssetDe}, #{empSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_INSIDE' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_TP_DIS_ASSET'
mapper.update: /*updateDisAsset*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_DIS_ASSET SET EMP_NAME = #{empName}, EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, DEPT_SEQ = #{deptSeq}, DEPT_NAME = #{deptName}, ASSET_NO = #{assetNo}, MODEL = #{model}, INS_AMT = #{insAmt}, PURC_LOC = #{purcLoc}, ASSET_NM = #{assetNm}, DIS_ISS = #{disIss}, DIS_ASSET_PB = #{disAssetPb}, INS_DE = #{insDe}, DIS_ASSET_DE = #{disAssetDe}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MOD_DT = now() WHERE DIS_ASSET_SN = #{disAssetSn}
mapper.select: /*getDisAssetData*/ SELECT A.*, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_DIS_ASSET A WHERE DIS_ASSET_SN = #{disAssetSn}
/*getDisAssetList*/ SELECT A.*, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_DIS_ASSET A WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}
mapper.insert:
/*insertResign*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_RESIGN ( DEPT_TEAM_NAME, POSITION, REGIST_NO, JOIN_DAY, RESIGN_DAY, JOB_DETAIL, RESIGN_TYPE, RESIGN_ISS, EMP_NAME, EMP_SEQ, DEPT_SEQ, DEPT_NAME, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{deptTeamName}, #{position}, #{registNo}, #{joinDay}, #{resignDay}, #{jobDetail}, #{resignType}, #{resignIss}, #{empName}, #{empSeq}, #{deptSeq}, #{deptName}, #{empSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_INSIDE' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_TP_RESIGN'
mapper.update: /*updateResign*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_RESIGN SET DEPT_TEAM_NAME = #{deptTeamName}, POSITION = #{position}, REGIST_NO = #{registNo}, JOIN_DAY = #{joinDay}, RESIGN_DAY = #{resignDay}, JOB_DETAIL = #{jobDetail}, RESIGN_TYPE = #{resignType}, RESIGN_ISS = #{resignIss}, EMP_NAME = #{empName}, EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, DEPT_SEQ = #{deptSeq}, DEPT_NAME = #{deptName}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MOD_DT = now() WHERE RESIGN_SN = #{resignSn}
mapper.select: /*getEmpData*/ SELECT HEI.BDAY, HEI.JOIN_DAY, HEI.JOB_DETAIL, HEI.RES_REGIS_NUM AS REGIST_NO, CONCAT(CASE WHEN HDI.DEPT_LEVEL = 2 THEN (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO DI WHERE HDI.PARENT_DEPT_SEQ = DI.DEPT_SEQ) ELSE HEI.DEPT_NAME END, " ", CASE WHEN HDI.DEPT_LEVEL = 2 THEN HEI.DEPT_NAME ELSE "" END) AS DEPT_TEAM_NAME FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO HEI LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO HDI ON HEI.DEPT_SEQ = HDI.DEPT_SEQ WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}
/*getResignList*/ SELECT A.*, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_RESIGN A WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}
mapper.insert:
/*insertDetails*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_DETAILS ( EMP_SEQ, EMP_NAME, DEPT_SEQ, DEPT_NAME, POSITION, BDAY, JOIN_COMP, DET_TITLE, DET_DE, DET_LOC, DET_CONT, DET_ETC, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{empSeq}, #{empName}, #{deptSeq}, #{deptName}, #{position}, #{bday}, #{joinComp}, #{detTitle}, #{detDe}, #{detLoc}, #{detCont}, #{detEtc}, #{empSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_INSIDE' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_TP_DETAILS'
mapper.update: /*updateDetails*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_DETAILS SET EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, EMP_NAME = #{empName}, DEPT_SEQ = #{deptSeq}, DEPT_NAME = #{deptName}, POSITION = #{position}, BDAY = #{bday}, JOIN_COMP = #{joinComp}, DET_TITLE = #{detTitle}, DET_DE = #{detDe}, DET_LOC = #{detLoc}, DET_CONT = #{detCont}, DET_ETC = #{detEtc}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MOD_DT = now() WHERE DET_SN = #{detSn}
mapper.select: /*getDetailsList*/ SELECT A.*, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_DETAILS A WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}
